content: repeat from * to end of round round 30 *p1 k2 c1b-k2tog repeat from * to end of round reduce by 6 30 remain sts round 31 *p1 k4 repeat from * to end of round round 32 *p1 c2f-ktog-ktog repeat from * to end of round reduce by 12 sts 18 sts remain finishing cut yarn learning an 8 tail using your yarn needle thread the yarn through the loops and drop the stiches from our knitting needle as you go cinch tightly and weave in ends finished measurements 8 inches wide x 9 inches tall 3 biggie braids beanie mindful artworks feel free to sell any items made from this pattern but please credit me as the designer copying distributing altering or selling this pattern is forbidden i would love to see what you make please tag me @mindfulartworks with #biggiebraidsbeanie message me with any pattern questions at taylorlarocco@gmail com gauge knitted on the round using us 13/9 mm needles braid has to full turns on right side and two full turns on left side with two purl sts on either side of braid per 4 inches by 4 inches thank you so much i hope you enjoy making this pattern and i cannot wait to see what you make taylor-mindful artworks 4
